sqlMap.select:
select DISTINCT c.uuid,c.*,achecku.user_name acheck_username,mdyu.USER_NAME lm_username,acheckd.dept_cname acheck_deptname,df.dept_cname df_name, acd.dept_cname acd_cname,chec.ym cym,chec.state cstate,p.POSITION_NAME position_name from qkj_r_score c left join qkj_r_sonscore ss on(ss.score_id=c.uuid) left join s_sys_user achecku on(c.acheck_user=achecku.uuid) left join s_cfg_position p on (achecku.[POSITION]=p.UUID) left join s_sys_user mdyu on(c.lm_user=mdyu.uuid) left join s_sys_user cuser on(cuser.UUID=ss.check_user) left join s_sys_department acheckd on(acheckd.dept_code=c.acheck_usercode) LEFT JOIN s_sys_department df on (df.dept_code=acheckd.parent_dept) left JOIN s_sys_department acd on(acd.dept_code=c.acheck_dept) left join qkj_t_indexdetail id on(id.uuid=ss.check_index) left join qkj_r_check chec on (chec.uuid=c.check_ym)
c.uuid=#uuid# c.check_ym=#check_ym# c.acheck_usercode=#acheck_usercode# chec.ym like #cym# +'%'
c.acheck_usercode In #apply_depts[]#
c.acheck_usercode In #apply_perdepts[]# c.acheck_user=#apply_userDouble#
cuser.UUID=#check_user#
c.acheck_usercode In #apply_perdepts[]# c.acheck_user=#apply_userDouble#

select * from s_sys_department d
d.uuid=#uuid#
d.parent_dept In #parent_dept[]#
d.dept_code In #chdept[]#
EXISTS(select 1 from qkj_t_indexdetail id where d.dept_code=id.dept_code and ISNULL(id.dept_code, '0')<>'0')

select DISTINCT u.uuid,u.USER_NAME,d.dept_cname dept_cname,p.POSITION_NAME position_name from s_sys_user u join s_sys_department d on (u.DEPT_CODE=d.dept_code) join s_cfg_position p on (u.[POSITION]=p.uuid)
u.uuid=#uuid#
u.parent_user=#parent_user#
d.parent_dept In #parent_dept[]#
u.dept_code In #chdept[]#
EXISTS(select 1 from qkj_t_indexdetail id join s_cfg_position p on (id.position_id=p.uuid) where u.[POSITION]=p.uuid and ISNULL(id.position_id, '0')<>'0')

select s.check_score,s.remark,c.ym cym,c.state cstate from qkj_r_score s join qkj_r_check c on (s.check_ym=c.uuid)
s.acheck_user=#acheck_user# c.ym like #cym# +'%' s.acheck_usercode=#acheck_usercode# and ISNULL(s.acheck_user, '0')='0'

select d.dept_code,d.dept_cname,d.parent_dept from s_sys_department d
where ((d.parent_dept in ( select ud.dept_code from s_sys_userdept ud join s_cfg_position p on (ud.[position]=p.uuid) where p.groupT=1 ) and LEN(d.dept_code)>3) or d.dept_code in ( select ud.dept_code from s_sys_userdept ud left join s_cfg_position p on (ud.[position]=p.uuid) where ud.roles like '%2016072516956868%' )) order by d.parent_dept

select DISTINCT u.UUID,u.USER_NAME,p.POSITION_NAME position_name,d.dept_cname dept_cname from s_sys_user u join s_cfg_position p on (u.[POSITION]=p.uuid) left join qkj_r_score s on (u.UUID=s.acheck_user) left join s_sys_department d on (d.dept_code=s.acheck_usercode) where 1=1
u.dept_code like #dept_code# +'%'

select DISTINCT c.uuid,c.*,achecku.user_name acheck_username,mdyu.USER_NAME lm_username,acheckd.dept_cname acheck_deptname,df.dept_cname df_name, acd.dept_cname acd_cname,chec.ym cym,chec.state cstate from qkj_r_score c left join qkj_r_sonscore ss on(ss.score_id=c.uuid) left join s_sys_user achecku on(c.acheck_user=achecku.uuid) left join s_sys_user mdyu on(c.lm_user=mdyu.uuid) left join s_sys_user cuser on(cuser.UUID=ss.check_user) left join s_sys_department acheckd on(acheckd.dept_code=c.acheck_usercode) LEFT JOIN s_sys_department df on (df.dept_code=acheckd.parent_dept) left JOIN s_sys_department acd on(acd.dept_code=c.acheck_dept) left join qkj_t_indexdetail id on(id.uuid=ss.check_index) left join qkj_r_check chec on (chec.uuid=c.check_ym)
c.uuid=#uuid# c.check_ym=#check_ym# c.acheck_usercode=#acheck_usercode# and ISNULL(c.acheck_user, '0')='0' chec.ym like #cym# +'%'
chec.ym>=#starcym# chec.ym<=#clocym#
c.acheck_user=#apply_userDouble#

select DISTINCT c.uuid,c.*,achecku.user_name acheck_username,mdyu.USER_NAME lm_username,acheckd.dept_cname acheck_deptname,df.dept_cname df_name, acd.dept_cname acd_cname,chec.ym cym,chec.state cstate from qkj_r_score c left join qkj_r_sonscore ss on(ss.score_id=c.uuid) left join s_sys_user achecku on(c.acheck_user=achecku.uuid) left join s_sys_user mdyu on(c.lm_user=mdyu.uuid) left join s_sys_user cuser on(cuser.UUID=ss.check_user) left join s_sys_department acheckd on(acheckd.dept_code=c.acheck_usercode) LEFT JOIN s_sys_department df on (df.dept_code=acheckd.parent_dept) left JOIN s_sys_department acd on(acd.dept_code=c.acheck_dept) left join qkj_t_indexdetail id on(id.uuid=ss.check_index) left join qkj_r_check chec on (chec.uuid=c.check_ym)
c.uuid=#uuid# c.check_ym=#check_ym# c.acheck_usercode=#acheck_usercode# and ISNULL(c.acheck_user, '0')='0' chec.ym like #cym# +'%'
chec.ym>=#starcym# chec.ym<=#clocym#
c.acheck_usercode In #apply_depts[]# and ISNULL(c.acheck_user, '0')='0'

select DISTINCT d.dept_code d,d.dept_cname acheck_deptname from s_sys_department d join qkj_t_indexdetail id on (d.dept_code=id.dept_code) where not EXISTS( select 1 from qkj_r_score s where s.acheck_usercode=d.dept_code and ISNULL(s.acheck_user, '0')='0' and s.check_ym=#check_ym# )

select DISTINCT u.UUID d,u.USER_NAME acheck_username from s_sys_user u join s_cfg_position p on (u.[POSITION]=p.uuid) join qkj_t_indexdetail d on (p.uuid=d.position_id) where not EXISTS( select 1 from qkj_r_score s where s.acheck_user=u.uuid and ISNULL(s.acheck_user, '0')!='0' and s.check_ym=#check_ym# )

select id.kpi kpi,id.weight weight,ss.check_score score,ss.check_goal gold,s.bscore bscore from qkj_r_sonscore ss join qkj_r_score s on (ss.score_id=s.uuid) join qkj_r_check c on (s.check_ym=c.uuid) left join qkj_t_indexdetail id on (id.uuid=ss.check_index)
s.acheck_user=#acheck_user# c.ym like #cym# +'%' s.acheck_usercode=#acheck_usercode# and ISNULL(s.acheck_user, '0')='0'

select MAX(aa.a) leavea,MAX(aa.b) leaveb, MAX(aa.c) leavec, MAX(aa.d) leaved from ( select COUNT(*) a,null b,null c,null d from qkj_r_score s join qkj_r_check c on (s.check_ym=c.uuid) where s.check_score>=90 and c.ym like #cym# +'%' and s.acheck_usercode like #dept_code# +'%' and ISNULL(s.acheck_user, '0')!='0'
UNION All
select null a,COUNT(*) b,null c,null d from qkj_r_score s join qkj_r_check c on (s.check_ym=c.uuid) where s.check_score>=80 and s.check_score<90 and c.ym like #cym# +'%' and s.acheck_usercode like #dept_code# +'%' and ISNULL(s.acheck_user, '0')!='0'
UNION All
select null a,null b,COUNT(*) c,null d from qkj_r_score s join qkj_r_check c on (s.check_ym=c.uuid) where s.check_score>=60 and s.check_score<80 and c.ym like #cym# +'%' and s.acheck_usercode like #dept_code# +'%' and ISNULL(s.acheck_user, '0')!='0'
UNION All
select null a,null b,null c,COUNT(*) d from qkj_r_score s join qkj_r_check c on (s.check_ym=c.uuid) where s.check_score<60 and c.ym like #cym# +'%' and s.acheck_usercode like #dept_code# +'%' and ISNULL(s.acheck_user, '0')!='0' ) aa
